[http://www.sonshinetv.com/ SonshineTV.com]| }} '''DXAQ-TV''', channel 43, is a [[television station]] of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] of [[ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network|Sonshine Media Network International]] (SMNI) located at Philippine-Japan Friendship Highway, Catitipan in [[Davao City]], [[Davao del Sur]]. ==See also== *[[DWBP-TV]] *[[Sonshine Media Network International]] {{Metro Davao TV}} [[Category:ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network]] [[ceb:DXAQ-TV]]
